wikipedia_page.main: William Finbar O'Sullivan (born 5 October 1959) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a midfielder. He also played non-league football for clubs including Dartford, Gravesend & Northfleet, Fisher Athletic, Dover Athletic, Crawley Town, Dulwich Hamlet, Bromley and Margate. He represented the Republic of Ireland at youth level.

response: Billy O'Sullivan (born 22 September 1968) is an Irish sportsman. He played hurling with his local club Ballygunner and with the Waterford senior inter-county team.

Billy O'Sullivan was born in Ballygunner, County Waterford in 1968.  He was educated locally and from an early age he showed a great interest in hurling.  Billy won an U15 Munster Colleges with De La Salle College, Waterford. He played for a combined Fitzgibbon Cup teams from 1987-1989.
